channel.title: Coding issue?

item.title: Coding issue?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Alright you see this code

case 1959: playerLevel[2] += 100; deleteItem(1959,getItemSlot(1959), 1); sendMessage("You eat the pumpkin, and gain 100 strength levels!"); refreshSkills(); break;
It works, whenever you eat a pumpkin your strength gains 100 levels! But this code doesn’t work…

case 1959: playerLevel[3] += 100; deleteItem(1959,getItemSlot(1959), 1); sendMessage("You eat the pumpkin, and gain 100 hitpoints levels!"); refreshSkills(); break;
It works on every skill i have tried it except on hitpoints. Does anyone know why? Is there for some reason a rule that you can’t go past 99 hitpoints. Well when you train like say strength you can’t get past 99 it won’t let you. Your hp starts at 99 from the beginning. I don’t understand. I can go into character files and change hp and it stays, but this code just won’t work for hp. Please tell me.

Read full topic
